TRUSTe for personal information other than related to Human Resources.  Vertex has agreed to TRUSTe dispute resolution for disputes relating to its compliance with the Safe Harbor Privacy Frameworks. If there are any complaints regarding Vertex’s compliance with the Safe Harbor, individuals should first contact Vertex Corporate Compliance. If contacting Corporate Compliance does not resolve the complaint, the complaint may be taken up with TRUSTe by Internet at
